Package smac.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SmacConfigReader
    The SmacConfigReader class reads and parses the SMAC module configuration file.
    SmacDirectoryUtils
    SmacDirectoryUtils is a class which groups static methods pertaining to folder operations used throughout the SMAC daemon.
    SmacDirectoryWatcherService
    The SmacDirectoryWatcherService class watches for changes that occur to a SMAC input queue directory and creates the required SMAC daemon task based on the changes observed.
    SmacEmlUtils
    SmacEmlUtils is a class which groups static methods pertaining to "EML" file operations used throughout the SMAC daemon.
    SmacFileUtils
    SmacFileUtils is a class which groups static methods pertaining to file operations used throughout the SMAC daemon.
    SmacLogFormatter
    Log formatter extends the Formatter class and formats the output of the logger in Syslog format.
    SmacQueueTypeUtils
    SmacQueueTypeUtils provides statics functions for mapping queue type names to their SmacQueueType counterparts.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SmacQueueType
    SmacQueueType defines the various queue types for either input or output which are available in the SMAC daemon.
